channel.title: honesty on Khaled Allen
channel.description: Recent content in honesty on Khaled Allen

item.title: Success, 14 Truths
item.description: The Basics Stay Healthy: Respect your body. It is your most vital tool. Eat well. Stay active. Sleep. Respect Yourself: Dress well. Stay clean. Give yourself a clean place to live. Love Yourself: You must, must, must be your own biggest supporter. Treat yourself with the same compassion you would offer your children. Commit to yourself. Commit to doing what it takes to make yourself happy and successful. Be Kind: To yourself, to others.

item.title: If You Want to Be Liked, Don't Try
item.description:
[caption id="attachment_1043" align="alignright" width="300" caption="moose.boy on Flickr"][/caption]

You follow what you feel inside
It's intuitive, you don't have to try
It comes naturally, mmmm it comes naturally

And it takes my breath away
What you do, so naturally

You are the thunder and I am the lightening
And I love the way you know who you are
And to me it's exciting

- Selena Gomez, "Naturally"

A friend of mine in the services industry is finding the customer relation aspect to be somewhat taxing. No matter how hard she works, there always seems to be some customer who decides to complain anyway. Even when she is doing everything right, someone finds something to criticize. As a very driven individual who always expects the best from herself, she has been trying very hard to rise to the challenges posed and improve her performance, but this doesn't seem to be helping. Customers still sometimes complain or whine or antagonize her.
